articles.description: The comedian is a proud father of two.
articles.content: When Kenan Thompson isn't playing a single dad in his new NBC sitcom, Kenan, he's being a real-life dad to his two daughters, Georgia and Gianna, and a husband to his wife of nearly 10 years, interio… [+2595 chars]
